nodes.text: Fralideja was the last remaining settlements of Mustafarians on the volcanic planet of Mustafar. It was the capital city of the planet. Centuries before the age of the Galactic Empire, all other cities on Mustafar were destroyed by a massive eruption, nearly wiping out their civilization. Fralideja was located near the lava mining complex that became the Separatist stronghold in 19 BBY.
